ygData.subject: Re: Intro
ygData.msgSnippet: Good Luck, Suzanne. I did something similar earlier this year. It isn t fun, but if something isn t right, then you have to do what you feel is best for you
ygData.messageBody:
Good Luck, Suzanne.
I did something similar earlier this year. It isn't
fun, but if something isn't right, then you have to do
what you feel is best for you and all close to you.
*gives you a hug* Hope the trip is well.

Elizabeth

--- Suzanne Johnson <katannah@...> wrote:
> From: Suzanne Johnson <katannah@...>
>
> Hi, Melissa, and welcome to our 'sisterhood'. =)
> We're trying to firm up a date for an all-women
> meeting that I am hosting on Quellios, during the
> first week in August. Please let me know what
> days are good for you, if you're interested in
> attending.
>
> On a side note, ladies, I'm moving to MD tomorrow
> via cross-country truck *groans* so I will be
> out of contact for a WHOLE WEEK. *sniffles*But I
> hope to have lots to read when I get my computer
> set back up. (not so subtle hint) This is an
> interesting move for me because I've quit my job and
> left my significant other at the same time, so bear
> with me and my "growing pains" as I move back
> in with my parents to go back to college full-time
> (me and my two kids). Hope no one out there
> can relate, but I'm sure some of you can. Anyway,
> good luck in your hunts, your friends, and your
> fate, and I will see you all in about a week!
>
> Sara, Povar
> Valdaya, Rallos Zek
> Ishtarre, Quellios
>
>
>
>

>
> ONElist members are using Shared Files in great
> ways!
